title: Friends of Old (3C16)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Fellowship: Reveal a card at random from an opponent's hand. Heal X [Elven] allies, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.
Lore:	”'You have been summoned here to answer the threat of Mordor.'”
Rarity:	C
